text: This mod's mechanics change depending on whether the Plants and/or Zombies are on normal blocks or water.
$(br2)For a plant to be planted on water it either needs the Amphibious trait, or to be planted on top of a Lily Pad.
$(br2)Some plants work differently depending on whether they are on land or water.
$(br2)When Zombies enter water, they will start riding a Ducky Tube. The Zombie's speed is the same as Ducky Tube's speed,
unifying zombie speeds, making slow zombies faster and fast zombies slower.
$(br2)Freeze slows down the Ducky Tube, while a complete freeze kills the zombie if it's riding a Ducky Tube. Zombies on water are immune to fire damage, including fire splash.
$(br2)If the body of water is only one block deep (including the block of water itself), the zombies will go through it, entering the Ducky Tube,
but if it's deeper, the zombies will more likely go around it, keep this in mind when using water.
